text: Ambalal Sarabhai was an Indian businessman and industrialist.Basu Aparna, As Times Change. Sarabhai Foundation, 2018. p 115, 123, 124 He is well known as a philanthropist and staunch supporter of Mahatma Gandhi.Howard Spodek, Ahmedabad: Shock City of Twentieth-Century India. Orient Blackswan Private Limited. 2012. p 37, 38, 39, 40, 121-139 ==References== Category:Indian businesspeople
title: Ambalal Sarabhai
